html: The first evil which is to bring the judgments of God upon Ephraim is the pride of their hearts. They have failed to recognize the judgments which have already come, and have rationalized that if their dwellings are destroyed they will build with better materials. Their reliance upon the material things and their own abilities is evidence of that pride which will cause their downfall. The descriptions of this evil and the other three which follow all end with the same pronouncement: God's judgment will not be "turned away."
